page.title: 16CHILDREN'S PLAY
page.content: CHILDREN DO NOT PLAY SO MANY GAMES AS THEY DID IN THE PAST.{INDOORS, CHILDREN PLAY BOARD GAMES BUT MOSTLY THEY PLAY WITH MODEL FIGURES AND CARS, VIDEO AND COMPUTER GAMES. MANY CHILDREN THOUGH SPEND A GREAT DEAL OF TIME JUST WATCHING TELEVISION AND VIDEO FILMS.{OUTDOORS,}CHILDREN PLAY FOOTBALL OR CRICKET, BIKE RIDING, ROLLER SKATING OR MADE_UP GAMES IN THE STREET. THERE IS A{BOYS CLUB}IN THE WHADDON ESTATE WHICH ORGANISES EVENTS AND OUTINGS, DISCOS AND SPORTS ACTIVITIES SUCH AS FOOTBALL, JUDO AND BMX BIKE RIDING. AT THE BACK OF THE CLUB A{BMX RACE TRACK}IS NOW BEING CONSTRUCTED AND BULLDOZERS HAVE HEAPED THE EARTH UP TO MAKE JUMPS ON THE COURSE.
